## Project Overview

Skolaris Fees Pay is a Laravel package for handling school fees in a multi-tenant SaaS environment.

## Features

- Multi-tenancy (Database per tenant)
- Payment Gateways (Flutterwave, Stripe, PayPal)
- Notifications (SMS, Email, WhatsApp)
- Receipts (PDF, Email)

## Development Guidelines

- Follow Laravel package development best practices.
- Ensure all new features are covered by tests.
